extendedInfo.description: ** NOTE ** If you want an app that tracks pitching stats, try out my new Pitching Tracker!Calling all little league parents, baseball coaches and others interested in baseball. Track multiple players batting averages while sitting at the game! Tracks 24 key statistics for multiple players! Great for little league baseball coaches. Great for parents to track your players progress. All statistics are saved in a database. Delete players or all stats for a player at any time. Very handy tool! Extremely flexible and easy to use!Here are the statistics that are tracked by the Baseball Tracker:    Batting Average (Avg)    At Bats    Hits    Singles    Doubles    Triples    Home Runs (HR)    Walks    Hit By Pitch (Hit B.P.)    Runs Batted In (RBI's)    On Base Percentage (OB%)    Fielder's Choices (Fld. Ch)    Strike Outs (St. Out)    Ground Outs (Gr. Out)    Fly Outs (Fly Out)    Line Outs (Line Out)    Sacrifice Bunts (Sac. Bunt)    Sacrifice Flies (Sac. Fly)    Stolen Bases (STB)    Stolen Base Attempts (STB Att)    Stolen Base Percent (STB %)    Base On Error (B. On Err)    Runs Scored (Runs Sc)    Slugging Percentage (SLG%)Get the Baseball Tracker - No Ads version for more features that are not included in this version.  Including the tracking of Pitching stats as well!******************************* IMPORTANT ** If you would like to receive updates for this app in the future, please download this version (Baseball Tracker-Free Edition) instead:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cg.bb.adsUnfortunately this version is currently locked and I won't be able to update it anymore.  If you have any questions, please contact me!*****************************

reviews.title: Simple and to the point
reviews.comment: I have used several stats programs and this is the most simple batting score card out there.  You can track your teams batting line up or a single user.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EXCELLENT !!!!
reviews.comment: I had a couple of questions and got a speedy response, also made a few suggestions. I know that the upgrades and additions can only make this app even better than it already is. Thank you....A.T.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No shortcut icon?
reviews.comment: App works great for keeping stats, but it didn\'t apply a shortcut so I have to search for it every time I want to access it. Also does not compute really low stats correctly. 1 out of 12 came up as .830 instead of .083. Still very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: Now I can keep up with my and my teams batting averages for every season! This seaspn I batted a .537!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Baseball Tracking
reviews.comment: Wife wanted a good tracker for son batting this yr.. this is not a good one.. It\'s a great one easy usage with a way to downloading.
reviews.author: Gary Waldrop

reviews.title: Nice app, but..
reviews.comment: One starred until app to SD enabled..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for individual batters
reviews.comment: Wish it had the ability to get team stats. Can only track per batter. Good start.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: This app needs the ability to edit info once its entered there no changing it.
reviews.author: Jerad Baletka

reviews.title: No Gods
reviews.comment: This Atheist likes it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice but no spot for errors
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Baseball app
reviews.comment: Great app so far!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful app
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to enter the players jersey number instead of   the number that the player was added to the tracker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I was trying to keep track of my sons stats and found this app. Works great, but would be nice to see individual game stats.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add/Rem
reviews.comment: What is the difference of the two data entry options?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can you add slugging percentage and singles to count as hits also please?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zach
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but....
reviews.comment: I would like to see game by game stats. Other than then its perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phil
reviews.comment: Includes base on error into the batting avg. Until this is fixed this isn\'t worth anything because it gives you the wrong avg.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy and to the point
reviews.author: Paul Matye

reviews.title: Gay
reviews.comment: Gay
reviews.author: Lewis Stambaugh
